jd: From: Aakash, Ozin Technologies aakash.sharma@ozin.ai Reply to: aakash.sharma@ozin.ai Job Title: IT PM (Infrastructure) Start Date: ASAP Duration: 6 Months ContractWork Status acceptable: US Citizens / Green Cards Location: 2-3 days / week in Perrysburg, Ohio office Number and type of interviews: 2-3 interviews Job DescriptionWe are looking for an IT PM that matches the criteria below. The criteria are deliberately high-level since we are looking for someone who can be local. We typically do 6-month contracts and will perpetually extend as long as the performance is satisfactory and there are projects to manage. PM local to NW Ohio who could work from the office 2-3 days a week Someone who the contracting firm worked with in the past and have received positive feedback Security, IAM, (NOT Mandatory) and Must Have Infrastructure project management experience
